STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_TITLE: Delicious Food, Delivered to Your Door
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore a world of flavors from local restaurants, all just a tap away
FEATURE_1_BODY: Experience swift and reliable food delivery right to your doorstep, with real-time tracking for ultimate convenience.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Explore a wide range of local eateries and popular chains, offering cuisine options to satisfy every craving.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Tailor your meals exactly to your liking with easy-to-use customization options and special instructions.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Enjoy regular promotions, loyalty rewards, and special offers to make your food delivery experience even more delightful.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Prioritize safety with our contactless delivery option, ensuring a hygienic and worry-free food ordering experience.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Get assistance anytime with our round-the-clock customer service, ready to address any questions or concerns about your order.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our food delivery service
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does your food delivery app work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to browse local restaurants, place orders, and have food delivered straight to your door. Simply download the app, create an account, select your items, and track your delivery in real-time.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Delivery fees vary based on your location and the restaurant you're ordering from. The exact fee will be displayed before you complete your order. We also offer a subscription service for free delivery on eligible orders.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How long does delivery usually take?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Delivery times depend on factors like distance, traffic, and restaurant preparation times. On average, most orders arrive within 30-45 minutes. You can always check the estimated delivery time in the app.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I schedule an order for later?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes! Our app allows you to schedule orders up to a week in advance. Simply select your desired delivery time during checkout.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: What if there's an issue with my order?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: If you experience any problems with your order, please use the 'Help' section in our app. Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you with refunds, missing items, or any other concerns.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the food delivery app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app allows you to browse local restaurants, select your favorite dishes, place an order, and have food delivered right to your doorstep. Simply download the app, create an account, and start ordering!
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What are the delivery fees and estimated delivery times?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Delivery fees vary based on the restaurant and your location. Estimated delivery times are provided for each order and typically range from 30-60 minutes, depending on distance and order complexity.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I track my order in real-time?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes! Once your order is confirmed, you can track its status in real-time through the app. You'll receive updates when the restaurant starts preparing your food and when the driver picks up your order.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What if there's an issue with my order?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: If you experience any issues with your order, please contact our customer support team through the app or website. We're committed to ensuring your satisfaction and will work to resolve any problems promptly.

TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Discover why food lovers across the city trust us for their cravings
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my meal times! Quick delivery, vast restaurant choices, and always piping hot. It's a game-changer!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love the variety of cuisines available. From local favorites to international delights, it's all just a tap away. Truly convenient!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The app's user-friendly interface and real-time tracking feature make ordering food a breeze. It's become my go-to for all meals!
